column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Best tapas place I've been to in the city! I highly suggest making a reservation here because it was insanely packed when I went on a Wednesday evening. Even with reservations my friend and I were placed in a tight corner with other tables right next to us. The atmosphere is dark and cozy but so lively inside. The menu is huge and has something for everyone!! I wanted to try almost everything but obviously had to limit myself. I'll list the items we tried:
